attributes.action: To create a international trust service providing vetting portal.
attributes.additional_details: My petition calls for an International Trust Verification Portal requiring all trustees in the British offshore islands to have trust deeds and payments independently checked by a randomly assigned notary. This would confirm that each deed is real, each payment is correct, and funds reach the proper beneficiary. The system would prevent fraud and protect investors while safeguarding the reputation and future of the offshore finance industry.
attributes.background: My petition calls for an International Trust Verification Portal where all trustees in the British offshore islands must have trust deeds and payments checked by a random notary to confirm legitimacy and correct distribution, protecting investors and the offshore industry.

rejection.details: The suggestion raised in this petition would be a matter for the authorities of the offshore territories in question.
